title: Chinese salt and pepper chips
ingredients: ['1 (900g) packet oven chips', '2 teaspoons salt', '2 to 3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, minced', '1 or more peppers to taste, sliced', '2 large chillies, chopped', '4 garlic cloves, crushed', '3cm fresh root ginger, crushed', '2 teaspoons sesame oil', '2 teaspoons dark soy sauce', '1 teaspoon ground black pepper', '2 teaspoons Chinese five spice']
